description:
*Please visit the official DRAGON BALL Xenoverse 2 web site for more information on each DLC.
*You may first need to update to the latest version.

Expand your experience with new exciting content!

・New Story: Heated Battle in Universe 6 Arc
・New Characters: Champa, Vados
・New Stage: Nameless Planet
・3 Parallel Quests
・8 Moves
3 Outfit/Accessory Sets
・5 Super Souls
・Float: Space Pod Float
Also includes assorted emotions, nicknames, and more.

You can get the content from Super Pack 2 with the DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Super Pass or by purchasing it individually!
name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Super Pack 2
